name: MADBALLS Button Pack
description: I'm a child of the 80's (and some of the 90's), and I looooved these little gross-out bastards. No artistry here, just pure nostalgia.

name: Vintage Halloween Masks Button Pack
description: An ode to a simpler time when you had costumes that could catch fire if you looked at them funny. Those were good times.

name: Bad Girls Button Pack
description: Six-pack of  bad girls that you should be familiar with. And if not, for shame!

name: Boob Tube Vixens Button Set
description: Six-pack of retro TV babes that you should be familiar with. And if not, for shame!

name: United States of Grindhouse 5" x 3" vinyl sticker
description: A design I cooked up while listening to Ministry, Rob Zombie and the like and watching too many trashy films.

name: Death Before Decaf Sticker
description: Pretty self explanatory. If you want just the sticker, or want additional stickers, this is the place to be.

name: Death Before Decaf Coffee Mug Set
description:
Enjoy your cup of black, liquidly high-test in the morning, and let those around you know that you won't settle for anything less than the good stuff. If you don't get the shakes, then what's the point, right? 

The mug is a ceramic, matte black mug with a white ceramic interior (so you can see just how black your coffee is). It has the DBD design screen printed on both sides in white. Please, hand-wash only. 

You also get a 2.5" x 2.5" Death Before Decaf screen-printed sticker, a 1.25" Death Before Decaf button and some other, secret goodies. 

Each set is lovingly packaged up in a shipping box that fits just right, so it'll be safe on its long journey to your quaking, caffine-deprived mitts. 

This product cannot be doubled up with other products to save shipping, as they are all individually packaged. My apologies. They will be shipped via USPS First Class mail with tracking. As of right now, shipping is only in the US and Canada.

Please allow two to three weeks to receive your vessel for sweet, sweet black nectar. 

UPDATE ON SHIPPING: I'm upgrading to bigger shipping boxes and better packing foam/bubblewrap to properly pack these lil' suckers up. Ergo, the rise in shipping fees. My apologies.

name: Nix's Hearse Vinyl Die-Cut Sticker
description: This sticker is roughly 2.5" x 8.25", is screen-printed black ink on white vinyl and, as you can see, is die-cut. Ships in a standard #9 envelope unless otherwise purchased with another item. Please allow at least two weeks for shipping. US orders only, please. If you are interested in ordering and live outside the USA, please contact me at nix@robertpaulnixon.com to arrange international shipping.

name: Pop Trash Prints
description:
I was noodeling about with some vintage photos (screen grabs, press photos, etc.) and started this small series (there will be more to come). Very simple... just some mock screen prints, if you will. 

Please allow at least two weeks for shipping. US orders only, please. All orders are shipped in packing tubes with tracking numbers (hence the shipping fees).

If you are interested in ordering and live outside the USA, please contact me at nix@robertpaulnixon.com to arrange international shipping.

name: Undead Jayne Mansfield Print
description:
12 x 18" digital print on heavy, 18 pound, uncoated, acid free stock of a zombified Jayne Mansfield. Not much else has to be said. Shipped alone in a tube for it's protection. If purchasing other items, this will be shipped separate from those items. 

Please allow at least two weeks for shipping. US orders only, please. If you are interested in ordering and live outside the USA, please contact me at nix@robertpaulnixon.com to arrange international shipping.

name: Glow-In-The-Dark "Dead Betty" Screen Print
description:
This screen print is three-colors and is hand-pulled with a laser die-cut. The three colors are gray, white and a hand-mixed clear with a ton of phosphorus mixed in it so when it's hit with a black light, you can see Dead Betty's skeleton. It measures to be around 4x10" and is printed on 100 lb French Dur-O-Tone Blacktop paper. It will be shipped in a 9x12" mailer with a backing board to protect the print.

Please allow at least two weeks for shipping. US orders only, please. If you are interested in ordering and live outside the USA, please contact me at nix@robertpaulnixon.com to arrange international shipping.

name: "Dead Sled" screen-print
description:
This is a hand-pulled, 3-color screen printed piece measuring 18.5x13 inches. It's printed on 100 lb. French Dur-O-Tone Butcher paper and was limited to just 20 pieces. It will be shipped in a very heavy-duty mailing tube with a wide circumference to prevent tight-rolling. 

Please allow at least two weeks for shipping. US orders only, please. If you are interested in ordering and live outside the USA, please contact me at nix@robertpaulnixon.com to arrange international shipping.

name: "Dead Sled" remix screen-print
description:
This is a hand-pulled, 3-color screen printed piece measuring 18.5x13 inches. It's printed on 100 lb. French Construction Blacktop paper and was limited to just five pieces. The white ink also has phosphorus mixed into it, so it'll have an eerie glow with a black-like. It will be shipped in a very heavy-duty mailing tube with a wide circumference to prevent tight-rolling. 

Please allow at least two weeks for shipping. US orders only, please. If you are interested in ordering and live outside the USA, please contact me at nix@robertpaulnixon.com to arrange international shipping.

name: "Unfortunates" Postcard Set
description:
Six 4x6" postcards with six tragic little stories. These six characters all represent a little bit of Halloween... and how it isn't the fun it's always cracked up to be. Printed on 100 lb. French Dur-O-Tone 'Butcher' paper, these cards are able to be mailed to anybody you desire. Preferably somebody with no sense of humor. 

Please allow at least two weeks for shipping. US orders only, please. If you are interested in ordering and live outside the USA, please contact me at nix@robertpaulnixon.com to arrange international shipping.

name: Homage Print: Leatherface
description:
An 8x10" print of the one, the only and original Leatherface Often imitated, never duplicated. It's printed on 80 lb., uncoated, acid-free stock and is shipped flat on a backing board to prevent curling. 

Please allow at least two weeks for shipping. US orders only, please. If you are interested in ordering and live outside the USA, please contact me at nix@robertpaulnixon.com to arrange international shipping.

name: Kill All Humans!  |  8x10"
description:
He drinks, smokes, complains, and sometimes, he even bends something. He's our favorite retro-future, human-hating robot! And he can be yours, today from the world of tomorrow! "Kill All Humans!" is printed on 80 lb., uncoated, acid-free stock and is shipped flat on a backing board to prevent curling. 

Please allow at least two weeks for shipping. US orders only, please. If you are interested in ordering and live outside the USA, please contact me at nix@robertpaulnixon.com to arrange international shipping.
